BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: Default - Required
BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is included in the assembly and is critical to the game.

BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: Default - Required Config
BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is included in the default build, you can customize the configs to suit yourself.

BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: Default - Optional
BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is included in the default assembly, but is optional.

BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: Workshop Mod - Fully Compatible
BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.description: The mod has been tested for compatibility and is fully compatible with the assembly.

BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: Workshop Mod - Compatible
BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.description: The mod is partially compatible. Modification Needed - Mods requiring balance and conversions to work with Paragon.

BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: Workshop Mod - Incompatible
BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.description: The mod has been tested for compatibility and is guaranteed to break your game.

BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: Unknown Mod
BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.description: The compatibility of this mod is not known (Default Option when not set).

BiOnline.ModIndicators.ModTypeDef.label: End Mod - No Mods Below These
